item.title: react-komposer
item.description: Recently I found quite nice HoC abstracting async data delivery for component. It’s called https://github.com/arunoda/react-komposer and I recommend you check it out as it provides clean API for defining async depencencies.

item.title: babel plugin tcomb
item.description: Recently I’ve found nice library to do dynamic typechecking with flow syntax. It’s called https://github.com/gcanti/babel-plugin-tcomb It’s just babel plugin which parses flow types and converts them into dynamic asserts. Quite usefull for testing IO boundaries.

item.title: babel plugin tcomb
item.description: Recently I’ve found nice library to do dynamic typechecking with flow syntax. It’s called https://github.com/gcanti/babel-plugin-tcomb It’s just babel plugin which parses flow types and converts them into dynamic asserts. Quite usefull for testing IO boundaries.
